title: Quarkus 2.5.1.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 2.5.1.Final, a maintenance release for our 2.5 release train containing bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.5. If you are not using 2.5 already, please refer to the 2.5 migration guide. Full changelog You can get the full changelog...
